description: This Java source file defines a Spring @Configuration class that customizes Feign client properties by providing a custom error decoder.

classes.name: CustomFeignClientConfiguration
classes.description: A Spring configuration class extending FeignClientProperties to provide custom Feign settings, including an error decoder.

methods.name: errorDecoder
methods.description: Defines a bean for a custom error decoder implementation, used for handling errors in Feign client calls.
